channel.title: mt3so on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in mt3so on Barefoot Rob

item.title: State of Marble Track 3
item.description: 09:05 Saturday 09 December 2017 JST The (first?) M-Splitter is complete. The big marbles roll its entire length, and medium sized marbles fall through. They do not yet have a lower track to catch their fall, though, and big marbles roll immediately off the track instead of around the hairpin turns. I am beginning to develop character traits for each character, and have defined some of their unique characteristics, though I have not settled on names for them.
